segments.text: We planned our wedding for next May .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why so late ? Didn ’ t she want to get married this October ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I did . But my fiancee has an important project .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s really a shame . By the way , who will be the bridesmaid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Julie ’ s friend , Mary . And John will be the best man .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! I ’ m very excited about your ceremony .
segments.speaker: S1
